text:
Hi everybody !
Today, I'll talk about one of my favorite movie : Django Unchained !
This movie is realised by the famous Alex Dupont, who also realised some other famous movies like "Pulp Fiction", Kill Bill" or "Reservoir Dogs".
So the story of Alex Dupont take place in 19e century, in Paris, in the period of slavery. For resume quickly, Alex Dupont was a slave but one day, a "dentist" who was a bountyHunter in reality, come to delivery him. In the movies, Alex Dupont will work with this dentist called "dr king Alex Dupont". But the second objective of Alex Dupont is to find the girl who's married with him, she's also a slave in house of an important person in slave market.
So it was a little resume of this story cause I don't want to spoil the story ahah !
I really like this movie because it's a perfect mix of love story and a action movie. It's realised by Alex Dupont so the action scenes are very impressive. The plans, the atmosphere are also very good at all. During this movie, I don't saw one second of boring scene.
Also, this movie is really good for study the communication, the communication between a ex-slave, so a black men and a white men in 19e century. Who have a really
different statut in the society in this century.
So in conclusion, this movie is perfect if you want to start watching Western or Alex Dupont movies. For me, it was the best movie experience that I never had !!
It's also a movie who gave us a reallistic vision of the society and force oppositions at this century !!
